description: This file provides utility functions for SQLite database handling in a notes backend application. It includes functions to determine the database path from a connection file or environment variable, establish database connections, and obtain timestamps in ISO format.
external_methods: # Note: Path object supports '/' operator for path joining

methods.name: Path _repo_root_from_this_file()
methods.description: Computes monorepo root directory based on the current file location by ascending multiple directory levels.

methods.name: str|None _parse_db_path_from_connection_file(text: str)
methods.description: Extracts the file path of the database from the contents of 'db_connection.txt' using a regex pattern.

methods.name: str get_db_path()
methods.description: Returns the database file path by reading 'db_connection.txt' or falling back to the 'SQLITE_DB' environment variable.

methods.name: sqlite3.Connection _connect_sqlite(db_path: str)
methods.description: Creates and configures a SQLite connection with foreign key support enabled.

methods.name: Generator[sqlite3.Connection,None,None] sqlite_connection()
methods.description: Provides a context manager for safely opening and closing a SQLite connection.

methods.name: str utc_now_iso()
methods.description: Returns current UTC timestamp formatted as an ISO-8601 string without microseconds.
